mapper.select: /* CommonDAO.errorLogList */ select a.error_no , a.was_instance , a.was_ip , a.was_port , a.error_req_type , a.error_message , a.ajax_yn , a.req_ip , a.req_date from tb_error_log a order by a.error_no desc

/* CommonDAO.errorLogDetail */ select a.error_no , a.was_instance , a.was_ip , a.was_port , a.request_content , a.exception_trace , a.function_param , a.error_req_type , a.error_message , a.ajax_yn , a.req_ip , date_format(a.req_date, '%Y년%m월%d일 %H:%i') as req_date from tb_error_log a where a.error_no = #{errorNo}

/* CommonDAO.selectLoginInfo */ select a.user_no , a.user_type , a.user_id , a.user_email , a.approved_yn , b.user_name , b.user_gender , b.tel1_no , calc_age(b.user_birthday) as user_age , get_file_path(b.photo_file_no) as user_photo_path , last_login_date , b.attendance_code , a.use_yn from tb_user a , tb_user_info b where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.user_password = #{userPass} and a.user_no = b.user_no

/* CommonDAO.authCheckUser */ select a.user_no , a.user_type , a.user_id , a.user_email , b.user_name , b.user_gender , b.tel1_no , calc_age(b.user_birthday) as user_age , get_file_path(b.photo_file_no) as user_photo_path , date_format(b.user_birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') as user_birthday , b.attendance_code , x.device_token , x.device_type from tb_login_hist x , tb_user a , tb_user_info b where x.auth_key = #{authKey} and x.logout_yn is null and x.logout_date is null and x.user_no = a.user_no and x.user_no = b.user_no and a.approved_yn = 'Y' and a.use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.delete: /* CommonDAO.cleanDeviceLoginHist */ delete from tb_login_hist where (user_no = #{user_no} and device_token is not null) or (device_token = #{deviceToken} and device_token is not null)
mapper.select: /* CommonDAO.getUserDeviceToken */ select a.device_token , a.device_type , a.is_production , a.user_no from tb_login_hist a where a.user_no in (${reciveUserNo}) and a.device_token is not null
